longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival. 

Visa required, except for Nationals of any country whose
national passport states that they were born in Algeria,
Bahrain, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Mauritania, Morocco, Oman,
Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Sudan, Syria, Tunisia, United Arab
Emirates or Yemen. (SEE NOTE 30346) 
    NOTE 30346: Those of Syrian origin holding foreign
   passport must hold one of the following documents
    
Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Nationals of Ukraine can obtain a
visa on arrival for a max. stay of 15 days. (SEE NOTE
13025)(SEE NOTE 13026)(SEE NOTE 25066) 
    NOTE 25066: Females between the age of 18 and 35 years of
   age being nationals of Ukraine, require a special
   permission from the Syrian Chief of Immigration except if
   married to nationals of Syria and holding proof of
   marriage.
    NOTE 13025: Not applicable to female artists, who need
   special approval from Syrian Immigration Headquarters prior
   to arrival. 
    NOTE 13026: Nationals of Ukraine require prior approval
   from Syrian Immigration Headquarters. 
Visa required, except for Those (mother, wife or children)
accompanying passengers of Syrian origin can obtain a visa on
arrival. 
Visa required, except for Holders of approval of a visa
pre-arranged by a sponsor in Syria, can obtain a visa on
arrival.   
Visa required, except for Nationals of countries without
representation of Syria can obtain a visa on arrival.   
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
Warning:
- Visitors will be refused entry if holding passports or
  travel documents:
  - stating that it is valid for Israel; and/or 
  - containing a visa (valid or expired) for Israel; and/or
  - containing a stamp indicating border crossing
  Israel-Jordan; and/or
  - holding tickets with evidence of entry in Israel or at
  Rafha, Gaza or Nablus.  
  
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required if arriving within 6
days after leaving or transiting countries with risk of yellow
fever transmission For details, click here.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 6 months of age.
- Passengers transiting countries with risk of yellow fever
  transmission provided not leaving the transit areas.
Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, exclusively due to P.
  vivax, is low and exists from May through October in
  areasalong the northern border, especially in rural areas of
  El Hasaka Governorate (although, no indigenous cases
  reported since 2005). Recommended prevention: none.
shortInfo: Можно оформить визу до 15 дней (36 $) на границе. Тразитная виза (24 часа) — 28$.
